The candidates who were initially appointed as Lower Division Clerks and promoted as Upper Division Clerks/Head Clerks invoked the jurisdiction of the Central Administrative Tribunal challenging Advertisement NO. 3 of 2013 dated 12 th September, 2013 whereby, the respondents set in process to fill up the posts advertised by way of direct recruitment.

tokenized_sentences.tagged_tgt: 2. जिन उम्मीदवारों को शुरू में लोअर डिवीजन क्लर्क के रूप में नियुक्त किया गया था और अपर डिवीजन क्लर्क/हेड क्लर्क के रूप में पदोन्नत किया गया था, उन्होंने विज्ञापन सं। NnUuMm० के NnUuMm३ दिनांक NnUuMm२ सितंबर, NnUuMm१ को, उत्तरदाताओं ने सीधी भर्ती के माध्यम से विज्ञापित पदों को भरने के लिए प्रक्रिया में सेट किया।
tokenized_sentences.target: 2. जिन उम्मीदवारों को शुरू में लोअर डिवीजन क्लर्क के रूप में नियुक्त किया गया था और अपर डिवीजन क्लर्क/हेड क्लर्क के रूप में पदोन्नत किया गया था, उन्होंने विज्ञापन सं। 2013 के 3 दिनांक 12 सितंबर, 2013 को, उत्तरदाताओं ने सीधी भर्ती के माध्यम से विज्ञापित पदों को भरने के लिए प्रक्रिया में सेट किया।

tokenized_sentences.text: The argument was that the Recruitment Regulations for the post of Administrative Officer/Assistant Assessor and Collector in North, South and East Delhi Municipal Corporations, 2013 contemplate that the vacancies for the posts in question are to be filled up by promotion failing which by direct recruitment.
tokenized_sentences.src: The argument was that the Recruitment Regulations for the post of Administrative Officer/Assistant Assessor and Collector in North, South and East Delhi Municipal Corporations, 2013 contemplate that the vacancies for the posts in question are to be filled up by promotion failing which by direct recruitment.
tokenized_sentences.tagged_src: The argument was that the Recruitment Regulations for the post of Administrative Officer/Assistant Assessor and Collector in North, South and East Delhi Municipal Corporations, NnUuMm० contemplate that the vacancies for the posts in question are to be filled up by promotion failing which by direct recruitment.
tokenized_sentences.tagged_tgt: तर्क यह था कि उत्तर, दक्षिण और पूर्व दिल्ली नगर निगमों में प्रशासनिक अधिकारी/सहायक ठेकेदार और कलेक्टर के पद के लिए भर्ती विनियम, NnUuMm० इस बात पर विचार करते हैं कि विचाराधीन पदों के लिए रिक्तियों को पदोन्नति द्वारा भरा जाना है जो सीधी भर्ती द्वारा।
tokenized_sentences.target: तर्क यह था कि उत्तर, दक्षिण और पूर्व दिल्ली नगर निगमों में प्रशासनिक अधिकारी/सहायक ठेकेदार और कलेक्टर के पद के लिए भर्ती विनियम, 2013 इस बात पर विचार करते हैं कि विचाराधीन पदों के लिए रिक्तियों को पदोन्नति द्वारा भरा जाना है जो सीधी भर्ती द्वारा।

tokenized_sentences.text: It was thus alleged that without resorting to promotion by convening meeting of the Departmental Promotion Committee , the alternative process of direct recruitment cannot be resorted to.
tokenized_sentences.src: It was thus alleged that without resorting to promotion by convening meeting of the Departmental Promotion Committee , the alternative process of direct recruitment cannot be resorted to.
tokenized_sentences.tagged_src: It was thus alleged that without resorting to promotion by convening meeting of the Departmental Promotion Committee , the alternative process of direct recruitment cannot be resorted to.
tokenized_sentences.tagged_tgt: इस प्रकार यह आरोप लगाया गया कि विभागीय पदोन्नति समिति की बैठक बुलाकर पदोन्नति का सहारा लिए बिना, सीधी भर्ती की वैकल्पिक प्रक्रिया का सहारा नहीं लिया जा सकता है।
tokenized_sentences.target: इस प्रकार यह आरोप लगाया गया कि विभागीय पदोन्नति समिति की बैठक बुलाकर पदोन्नति का सहारा लिए बिना, सीधी भर्ती की वैकल्पिक प्रक्रिया का सहारा नहीं लिया जा सकता है।

tokenized_sentences.text: The said Original Application was dismissed by the Tribunal on 28 th May, 2015 by observing that the recruitment process is not against the constitutional provisions but the promotion must also not be tempered with.
tokenized_sentences.src: The said Original Application was dismissed by the Tribunal on 28 th May, 2015 by observing that the recruitment process is not against the constitutional provisions but the promotion must also not be tempered with.
tokenized_sentences.tagged_src: The said Original Application was dismissed by the Tribunal on NnUuMm१ th May, NnUuMm० by observing that the recruitment process is not against the constitutional provisions but the promotion must also not be tempered with.
tokenized_sentences.tagged_tgt: न्यायाधिकरण द्वारा NnUuMm१ मई, NnUuMm० को उक्त मूल आवेदन को खारिज कर दिया गया था, यह देखते हुए कि भर्ती प्रक्रिया संवैधानिक प्रावधानों के खिलाफ नहीं है, लेकिन पदोन्नति के साथ भी गुस्सा नहीं होना चाहिए।
tokenized_sentences.target: न्यायाधिकरण द्वारा 28 मई, 2015 को उक्त मूल आवेदन को खारिज कर दिया गया था, यह देखते हुए कि भर्ती प्रक्रिया संवैधानिक प्रावधानों के खिलाफ नहीं है, लेकिन पदोन्नति के साथ भी गुस्सा नहीं होना चाहिए।

tokenized_sentences.text: In the writ petition directed against such order, the High Court held that the respondents have failed to comply with the Recruitment Rules and that only after the respondents are unable to fill up the vacancies either by promotion or by transfer or by deputation, the Department would be entitled to publish the advertisement to fill up the vacancies.
tokenized_sentences.src: In the writ petition directed against such order, the High Court held that the respondents have failed to comply with the Recruitment Rules and that only after the respondents are unable to fill up the vacancies either by promotion or by transfer or by deputation, the Department would be entitled to publish the advertisement to fill up the vacancies.
tokenized_sentences.tagged_src: In the writ petition directed against such order, the High Court held that the respondents have failed to comply with the Recruitment Rules and that only after the respondents are unable to fill up the vacancies either by promotion or by transfer or by deputation, the Department would be entitled to publish the advertisement to fill up the vacancies.
tokenized_sentences.tagged_tgt: इस तरह के आदेश के खिलाफ निर्देशित रिट याचिका में, उच्च न्यायालय ने कहा कि उत्तरदाता भर्ती नियमों का पालन करने में विफल रहे हैं और केवल उत्तरदाताओं के पदोन्नति या स्थानांतरण या प्रतिनियुक्ति द्वारा रिक्तियों को भरने में असमर्थ होने के बाद, विभाग रिक्त पदों को भरने के लिए विज्ञापन प्रकाशित करने का हकदार होगा।
tokenized_sentences.target: इस तरह के आदेश के खिलाफ निर्देशित रिट याचिका में, उच्च न्यायालय ने कहा कि उत्तरदाता भर्ती नियमों का पालन करने में विफल रहे हैं और केवल उत्तरदाताओं के पदोन्नति या स्थानांतरण या प्रतिनियुक्ति द्वारा रिक्तियों को भरने में असमर्थ होने के बाद, विभाग रिक्त पदों को भरने के लिए विज्ञापन प्रकाशित करने का हकदार होगा।

tokenized_sentences.text: It was also found that no effort has been made to hold DPC to carry out promotions nor the respondents have explored the possibility to fill up the vacancies either by transfer or deputation.
tokenized_sentences.src: It was also found that no effort has been made to hold DPC to carry out promotions nor the respondents have explored the possibility to fill up the vacancies either by transfer or deputation.
tokenized_sentences.tagged_src: It was also found that no effort has been made to hold DPC to carry out promotions nor the respondents have explored the possibility to fill up the vacancies either by transfer or deputation.

data.text: 2 for short, ‘Tribunal’
the respondents set in process to fill up the posts advertised by
way of direct recruitment.  The argument was that the Recruitment
Regulations   for   the   post   of   Administrative   Officer/Assistant
Assessor and  Collector in North, South and East Delhi Municipal
Corporations, 2013
contemplate that the vacancies for the posts
in question are to be filled up by promotion failing which by direct
recruitment.     It   was   thus   alleged   that   without   resorting   to
promotion by convening meeting of the Departmental Promotion
Committee4
, the alternative process of direct recruitment cannot
be resorted to.  The said Original Application was dismissed by the
Tribunal   on   28
th
May,   2015   by   observing   that   the   recruitment
process   is   not   against   the   constitutional   provisions   but   the
promotion must also not be tempered with.   In the writ petition
directed   against   such   order,   the   High   Court   held   that   the
respondents have failed to comply with the Recruitment Rules and
that only after the respondents are unable to fill up the vacancies
either   by   promotion   or   by   transfer   or   by   deputation,   the
Department would be entitled to publish the advertisement to fill
up the vacancies.  It was also found that no effort has been made
to   hold   DPC   to   carry   out   promotions   nor   the   respondents   have
explored the possibility to fill up the vacancies either by transfer or
deputation
The advertisement was published to fill up 30 vacancies by direct
recruitment to the posts in question out of which 8 were reserved
3 for short, ‘Recruitment Rules’
4 for short, ‘DPC’
